definition: demonic/iniquitous/nefarious/evil/unhealthy influences that cause disease (Chinese medicine)/(coll.) strange/abnormal
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: Incensed at not being included in the originalAxis of Evil, France refuses to participate.
sentences.chinese: 忿恨於未被美國列爲邪惡軸心之一，法國拒絕參戰。

sentences.english: Until then, the axis of evil continues to terrorise us.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，邪惡軸心繼續地嚇唬着我們。
